text: Conservatives in furor over Julia Roberts ad  —  A new Harris-Walz campaign ad voiced by actor Julia Roberts encourages women to vote for Vice President Harris in the presidential election, even if their husbands are backing former President Trump.  —  The Roberts ad also alludes to abortion rights …
